mapper.insert:
SELECT def_seq.nextval FROM dual
insert into calendar( calendarno, caltitle, calcontent, startdate, enddate, writer, backgroundColor, textColor ) values( #{calendarno}, #{title}, #{description}, #{start}, #{end}, #{username}, #{backgroundColor}, #{textColor} )
mapper.update: update calendar set caltitle=#{title}, calcontent=#{description}, startdate=#{start}, enddate=#{end}, writer=#{username}, backgroundColor=#{backgroundColor}, textColor=#{textColor} where calendarno = #{calendarno}
